text:
I'll help you create a sequence for a C major triad (C-E-G) using MIDI notes 60 (C4), 64 (E4), and 67 (G4) in sequence.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="generate_musical_sequence">
<parameter name="sequence_data">
[
  {"note": 60, "start": 0.0, "duration": 1.0, "velocity": 80},
  {"note": 64, "start": 1.0, "duration": 1.0, "velocity": 80}, 
  {"note": 67, "start": 2.0, "duration": 1.0, "velocity": 80}
]
</parameter>
<parameter name="description">Simple C major triad</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
